com.brightcove.player.captioning

Class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.captioning.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningStyle

  • public class BrightcoveClosedCaptioningStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the styles applying to Closed Captions are to be presented to the user during video playback.
